snippet: The newly appointed chief executive owes his new job to his success in making Google products easier to use and thus more popular.
abstract: Profile of Sundar Pichai, new chief of operations at Google who is known for his intense focus on user experience; Pichai's rise at Google can be tied to his success in making Google products easier to use and consequently more popular.

byline.original: By DAVID STREITFELD and MIKE ISAAC
byline.contributor: David Streitfeld reported from San Francisco and Mike Isaac from New York. Claire Cain Miller contributed reporting from San Francisco.

lead_paragraph: The newly appointed chief executive owes his new job to his success in making Google products easier to use and thus more popular.

headline.main: Sundar Pichai Will Lead Google With Users in Mind
headline.print_headline: Leader With Users in Mind Will Take the Helm at Google
